alert.note: Alert for Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 25 at 1:00AM MST until November 26 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Upper Gila River Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
